addonManifest.name: Syslog Connection
addonManifest.description: Provides connection information for an operator-designated Syslog endpoint scoped to a development team.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: This add-on allows operators to publish a syslog endpoint including host, port, and protocol as well as the type of Syslog receiver at that endpoint to a development team
addonManifest.developerHelp: There are no inherent credentials support for this add-on - it is intended for transport-only endpoint definition by your platform operators
addonManifest.author: Jonathan Choy (@tetsujinoni)

property.description: (tcp, encryptedtcp (for TLS over TCP) or udp)
